Class MustFailDbUnitTestExecutionListener

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.test.context.TestExecutionListener

    public class MustFailDbUnitTestExecutionListener
extends TransactionDbUnitTestExecutionListener
    An extension of TransactionDbUnitTestExecutionListener that ensures that a test method has failed.
    Author:
    Phillip Webb
